vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.49;
son of: Caleb (H3612H) and Maacah (H4601L);
brother of: Sheber (H7669), Tirhanah (H8647) and Shaaph (H8174H);
half-brother of: Hur (H2354), Jesher (H3475), Shobab (H7727H), Ardon (H0715), Mareshah@1Ch.2.42 (H4337), Haran (H2771B), Moza (H4162), Gazez (H1495), Jahdai (H3056) and Achsah (H5915H);
father of: Machbenah (H4343) and Gibea (H1388)
§ Sheva = "Jehovah contends"
Judaite, son of Caleb by his concubine Maachah and grandson of Hezron
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   secretario; en tiempos de David; (b)   descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá; fundador de Macbená y Guibeá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
示法 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華競爭"
一位猶大人, 迦勒和其妾瑪迦所生, 希斯崙的孫子 (撒下 20:25; 代上 2:49)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
示法 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华竞争"
一位犹大人, 迦勒和其妾玛迦所生, 希斯仑的孙子 (撒下 20:25; 代上 2:49)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.8.17;
father of: Elihoreph (H0456) and Ahijah (H0281); also called Shavsha at 1Ch.18.16; Sheva(Ketiv: Sheya) at 2Sa.20.25; Shisha at 1Ki.4.3;
Another name of se.ra.yah (שְׂרָיָהוּ "Seraiah" H8304)
§ Sheva = "Jehovah contends"
Judaite, son of Caleb by his concubine Maachah and grandson of Hezron
